channel.title: Say Hi on Vno Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Say Hi on Vno Hugo

item.title: Sample Post
item.description: Youâ€™ll find this post in your posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run hugo serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated. To add new posts, simply add a file in the posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.
